13  package org.cesecore.authorization.cache;
14  
15  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
16  import static org.junit.Assert.assertNull;
17  import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
18  
19  import java.lang.reflect.Field;
20  import java.util.HashMap;
21  import java.util.HashSet;
22  import java.util.Map;
23  import java.util.Set;
24  
25  import org.apache.log4j.Logger;
26  import org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken;
27  import org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.PublicAccessAuthenticationToken;
28  import org.cesecore.authorization.access.AccessSet;
29  import org.cesecore.util.ConcurrentCache;
30  import org.junit.After;
31  import org.junit.Before;
32  import org.junit.Test;
33  
34  /**
35   * @version $Id: RemoteAccessSetCacheHolderTest.java 25893 2017-05-23 20:10:03Z mikekushner $
36   */
37  @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
38  public final class RemoteAccessSetCacheHolderTest {
39  
40      private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(RemoteAccessSetCacheHolderTest.class);
41      
42      private final AuthenticationToken token1 = new PublicAccessAuthenticationToken("CN=test1", false);
43      private final AuthenticationToken token2 = new PublicAccessAuthenticationToken("CN=test2", false);
44      
45      @Test
46      public void testStartFinishCycle() {
47          log.trace(">testStartFinishCycle");
48          assertTrue("The cache should be empty initially", RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.getCache().getKeys().isEmpty());
49          
50          log.debug("Starting a update number 10");
51          Set<AuthenticationToken> existing = RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.startCacheReload(10);
52          assertTrue("Returned set should be empty", existing.isEmpty());
53          assertNull("Should return null when trying to refresh with old update.", RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.startCacheReload(9));
54          assertNull("Should return null when trying to refresh with -1 while update is in progress.", RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.startCacheReload(-1));
55          
56          final Map<AuthenticationToken,AccessSet> newCache = new HashMap<>();
57          final Set<String> set = new HashSet<>();
58          set.add("/test");
59          final AccessSet as = new AccessSet(set);
60          newCache.put(token1, as);
61          
62          RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.finishCacheReload(10, newCache);
63          assertEquals("Cache should have been updated", 1, RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.getCache().getKeys().size());
64          
65          log.debug("Starting a update number 11");
66          existing = RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.startCacheReload(11);
67          assertEquals("Wrong number of entries in list of existing auth tokens", 1, existing.size());
68          assertEquals("Wrong auth token in list", token1, existing.iterator().next());
69          
70          final Map<AuthenticationToken,AccessSet> newCache2 = new HashMap<>();
71          final Set<String> set2 = new HashSet<>();
72          set2.add("/test1");
73          set2.add("/test2");
74          final AccessSet as2 = new AccessSet(set2);
75          newCache2.put(token1, as2);
76          newCache2.put(token2, as2);
77          
78          log.debug("Should not overwrite cache");
79          RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.finishCacheReload(10, newCache2);
80          assertEquals("Old update number should not overwrite the cache", 1, RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.getCache().getKeys().size());
81          
82          log.debug("Should overwrite cache");
83          RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.finishCacheReload(11, newCache2);
84          assertEquals("Cache should have been updated again", 2, RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.getCache().getKeys().size());
85          log.trace("<testStartFinishCycle");
86      }
87      
88      @Before
89      @After
90      public void reset() throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalAccessException, NoSuchFieldException, SecurityException {
91          final Field lastUpdField = RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.class.getDeclaredField("lastUpdate");
92          lastUpdField.setAccessible(true);
93          lastUpdField.setInt(null, 0);
94          
95          final Field inProgressField = RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.class.getDeclaredField("regularUpdateInProgress");
96          inProgressField.setAccessible(true);
97          inProgressField.setBoolean(null, false);
98          
99          final Field cacheField = RemoteAccessSetCacheHolder.class.getDeclaredField("cache");
100         cacheField.setAccessible(true);
101         cacheField.set(null, new ConcurrentCache<AuthenticationToken,AccessSet>());
102     }
103     
104 }
